main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Kerrville, Texas, on June 30, 1957, involving one object observed with radar and visually.
interesting points: The object was described as being over 700 feet wide and 200 feet high with a brilliant orange light., The duration of the observation was approximately 30 minutes., Radar data was available but deemed limited and inconclusive., The conclusion suggested the object might have been a high altitude balloon reflecting sunlight., There were reports of balloons in the area at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: One object with a brilliant orange light
witness description: Radar observations were made; no eyewitnesses were confirmed in the report.
